message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10000. It's a great deal for both of us, as it's well below what it's worth to you and gives me a good profit. Let me know what you think!

Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay a bit more than what you think the product is worth to you. Let me know if this is something you'd be willing to consider.

Bob, thanks for the offer. I appreciate your interest, but I need to get a bit closer to my desired price point. I'm willing to meet you halfway and come down to $9250. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's make this deal happen!

Hi Alice, I understand that you're trying to get closer to your desired price point, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $9000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me. Let me know if this is something you'd be willing to consider.
